description.p: A family classic, the objective of Four-in-a-row is to build a line of four of your marbles while trying to stop your opponent (human or computer) from building a line of his or her own. A line can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal. The first player to connect four in a row is the winner!
Four-in-a-row features multiple difficulty levels. If youâ€™re having trouble, you can always ask for a hint.

A family classic, the objective of Four-in-a-row is to build a line of four of your marbles while trying to stop your opponent (human or computer) from building a line of his or her own. A line can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal. The first player to connect four in a row is the winner!
Four-in-a-row features multiple difficulty levels. If youâ€™re having trouble, you can always ask for a hint.

Familia klasiko. La celo de Kunligu Kvar estas konstruado de linio de kvar viaj rulglobetoj, klopodante ke via kontraÅ­ludanto (homa aÅ­ komputila) konstruu sian propran linion. Linio povas esti horizontala, vertikala, aÅ­ diagonala. La unua ludanto, kiu kunligas kvar, gajnas!
Kunligu Kvar havas diversajn malfacilecajn nivelojn. Se vi luktas, vi Ä‰iam povas peti konsileton.

Un clÃ¡sico familiar, el objetivo de Cuatro en raya es construir una lÃ­nea con sus cuatro canicas mientras intenta evitar su oponente (que puede ser humano o el propio equipo) haga la suya. Una lÃ­nea puede ser horizontal, vertical o diagonal. El primer jugador en conseguir las cuatro en raya gana.
